name: Apishore-foundation-browser
body:
### Why one more CSS framework?
This framework is designed to support our code generation technology. It is highly customizable and focused on modularity and ability to mix with other frameworks. It is important in case of mixing legacy code with code generated by our requirements compiler.

### Documentation
Documentation is in our [wiki](https://github.com/apishore/apishore-foundation-browser/wiki).

### Support or Contact
If you are interested feel free to [contact us](mailto:contact@apishore.com).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
